name: mtaconf-lambda-functions
description: Lambda functions for MTA Conference livestream authentication

scripts.deploy: pnpm run build && zip -r lambda-functions.zip dist/ node_modules/ -x "setup-dynamodb.js" && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name livestream-password-verify --zip-file fileb://lambda-functions.zip --profile mta
scripts.setup: pnpm run build && AWS_PROFILE=mta node dist/setup-dynamodb.js setup
scripts.add-password: pnpm run build && AWS_PROFILE=mta node dist/setup-dynamodb.js add-password
scripts.list-passwords: pnpm run build && AWS_PROFILE=mta node dist/setup-dynamodb.js list
scripts.remove-password: pnpm run build && AWS_PROFILE=mta node dist/setup-dynamodb.js remove-password

author: MTA Conference
